title: Smithing/Experience table

properties.name: description
properties.value: This table shows all possible experience sources for Smithing in the game, as well as all interactions that require a Smithing level. It also lists the items involved in the interactions, as well as other skills involved in processing the item.

content:
This table shows all possible experience sources for Smithing in the game, as well as all interactions that require a Smithing level. It also lists the items involved in the interactions, as well as other skills involved in processing the item.

Contents

  • 1 Ores
  • 2 Bronze bar
  • 3 Iron bar
  • 4 Steel bar
  • 5 Lovakite bar
  • 6 Mithril bar
  • 7 Adamant bar
  • 8 Runite bar
  • 9 Other bars
  • 10 Crystal singing
    • 10.1 Regular crystals
    • 10.2 The Gauntlet
  • 11 Other experience sources

This table shows all possible experience sources for [[Smithing]] in the game, as well as all interactions that require a Smithing level. It also lists the items involved in the interactions, as well as other skills involved in processing the item.

==Ores==
{{Skill table
|skill = Smithing
|query = [[Uses material::~*ore]][[Uses facility::Furnace||Lovakite furnace]]
|images = icons
|tools = no
}}

==Bronze bar==
{{Skill table
|skill = Smithing
|query = [[Uses material::Bronze bar]]
|images = icons
|other skills = no
}}

|query = [[Uses material::Iron bar]]
|images = icons
|other skills = no
}}

{{Skill table

|other skills = no
}}

}}

|skill = Smithing

|images = icons

}}

}}

|images = icons
|other skills = no
}}

==Other bars==
{{Skill table
|skill = Smithing
|query = [[Uses material::Gold bar||Silver bar||Blurite bar||Elemental metal||Lunar bar]]
|images = icons
|other skills = no
}}

==Crystal singing==
===Regular crystals===
{{Skill table
|skill = Smithing
|query = [[Uses material::Crystal shard]]
|images = icons
|tools = no
}}
===[[The Gauntlet]]===
{{Skill table
|skill = Smithing
|query = [[Uses material::Crystal shards||Corrupted shards]]
|images = icons
|tools = no
}}

==Other experience sources==
{{Skill table
|skill = Smithing
|query = [[Smithing experience::>0]]
|exclude material = bar%], elemental metal, crystal shard, corrupted shard, ore
|images = icons
|other skills = no
}}
